name: CURIO WELLNESS
govEntities: Office of Natl Drug Control Policy (NDCP)
sampleDescriptions: Reform of the 280E section of the Internal Revenue Code
Advocate for a change in the Internal Revenue Code 280E to reduce taxation on legal marijuana business.
Advocate for a change in the Internal Revenue Code 280E to reduce taxation on legal cannabis business.
Advocate for a change in the Internal Revenue Code 280E to reduce taxation on legal cannabis business, including in H.R. 6800, the Heroes Act.
